name: grav-dev-template
description: Template for Grav CMS easy Development with docker

scripts.dev:unzip: unzip ./tmp/grav-v$npm_package_config_version.zip 'grav/user/*' -d user && cp -r user/grav/user/* user && rm -r user/grav
scripts.dev:install: npm run dev:download && npm run dev:unzip && npm run dev:install-theme-js && docker-compose up -d
scripts.grav:list: docker-compose exec -u www-data gravcms php bin/grav list
scripts.grav:install: docker-compose exec -u www-data gravcms php bin/gpm install

author: Author
